column5: This is a small garage apartment on a residential street. The living/bedroom has a cathedral ceiling, skylights, and a kitchenette, including a cooktop, microwave, and refrigerator. The bed is normally a twin but pulls out to double twin. The bathroom has an open shower.  We are near downtown Houston, with a bus line 1 block away, a rail station 1/2 mile away, and Houston Hobby Airport just a 15-min drive. Other area attractions (museums/convention ctr/theaters/stadiums) are a 10-15-min drive.
